agent_blocked.description: Single agent is blocked and cannot move forward
agent_blocked.resolution: Backtrack along the agent's path history

agents_blocked.description: Multiple agents are blocking each other's paths
agents_blocked.resolution: Switch positions between the blocking agents

path_blocked.description: Path is blocked by obstacles or other agents
path_blocked.resolution: Recalculate path and clear old path history

circular_wait.description: Agents are waiting for each other in a circular pattern
circular_wait.resolution: Break the circular wait by moving the lowest weight agent back

resource_deadlock.description: Agents are waiting for resources held by each other
resource_deadlock.resolution: Release resources and backtrack to last free position
